trans-unit.source: A client receiver for multicast traffic from a single source, also known as Source Specific Multicast (SSM).
trans-unit.target: 用戶端接收器來自單一來源，也稱為來源特定多點傳送 (SSM) 的多點傳送流量。

trans-unit.source: The multicast group address and sender source address must be known.
trans-unit.target: 必須知道的多點傳送的群組位址和寄件者來源位址。

trans-unit.source: In addition to receiving multicast data from a specific sender, the UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient client can also send unicast data back to the sender.
trans-unit.target: 除了來自特定寄件者接收多點傳送的資料，UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient 用戶端也可以傳送單點傳播資料傳回給寄件者。

trans-unit.source: To receive multicast from multiple sources, or when the sources aren't known in advance, use the UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient class instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要從多個來源，或來源不事先知道接收多點傳送，請改為使用 UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient 類別。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"></xref> UDP client that can subscribe to a group address and receive datagrams from a single source.
trans-unit.target: 建立新<xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"> </xref> UDP 用戶端，可以訂閱群組位址，並從單一來源接收資料包。

trans-unit.source: The UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient constructor associates a UDP multicast socket with a group address and port, but does not bind or otherwise use the socket.
trans-unit.target: 與群組位址和連接埠，UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient 建構函式產生關聯的 UDP 多點傳送的通訊端，但不會繫結或否則使用通訊端。

trans-unit.source: The `groupAddress` parameter may be either an IPv6 or IPv4 multicast address.
trans-unit.target: `groupAddress`參數可能是 IPv6 或 IPv4 多點傳送位址。

trans-unit.source: However, the address family of the `sourceAddress` and `groupAddress` parameters must the same.
trans-unit.target: 不過的位址系列`sourceAddress`和`groupAddress`參數必須相同。

trans-unit.source: The `localPort` parameter must not specify a port less than 1,024.
trans-unit.target: `localPort`參數必須指定小於 1024 的連接埠。

trans-unit.source: The sender source address for this receiver to subscribe to.
trans-unit.target: 此訂閱的收件者寄件者來源位址。

trans-unit.source: The multicast group address for this receiver to subscribe to.
trans-unit.target: 此收件者要訂閱多點傳送的群組位址。

trans-unit.source: The local port for this receiver to bind to.
trans-unit.target: 本機連接埠繫結到此收件者。

trans-unit.source: sourceAddress and groupAddress must be the same address family.
trans-unit.target: sourceAddress和groupAddress必須是相同的位址系列。

trans-unit.source: sourceAddress is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: sourceAddress為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中 Nothing)。

trans-unit.source: -or- groupAddress is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: -或-groupAddress為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中 Nothing)。

trans-unit.source: localPort is less than 0 -or- localPort is greater than 65,535.
trans-unit.target: localPort小於 0-或-localPort大於 65,535。

trans-unit.source: localPort is less than 1024
trans-unit.target: localPort小於 1024

trans-unit.source: Binds the socket and begins a join operation to the multicast group to allow datagrams to be received from a single source address.
trans-unit.target: 繫結通訊端，並開始聯結作業到多點傳送的群組，以允許從單一來源位址接收資料包。

trans-unit.source: The BeginJoinGroup method binds a UDP multicast socket to a local port and joins a multicast group to allow datagrams to be received from a single source address.
trans-unit.target: BeginJoinGroup 方法繫結的本機連接埠將 UDP 多點傳送的通訊端，而且聯結多點傳送的群組，以允許從單一來源位址接收資料包。

trans-unit.source: The multicast group address, single source address, and local port to bind to are specified in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 中指定多點傳送的群組位址、 單一來源位址和本機連接埠繫結至<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when the operation to join the multicast group has completed.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的方法`callback`加入多點傳送的群組作業完成時，會叫用參數。

trans-unit.source: If required by the runtime, the BeginJoinGroup method also performs a policy check to verify that the client is allowed to access the multicast group.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要執行階段，BeginJoinGroup 方法也會執行原則檢查，確認允許用戶端存取多點傳送的群組。

trans-unit.source: If the client is not allowed access, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown with <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允許存取，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>就會擲回與<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError></xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>用戶端。

trans-unit.source: A callback method to invoke when the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 在作業完成時叫用的回呼方法。

trans-unit.source: Optional state information to pass to the `callback` method for this operation.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞給選擇性狀態資訊`callback`這項作業的方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.IAsyncResult>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.IAsyncResult>.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references this operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>參考這項作業。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: The multicast group has already been joined or a join operation is currently in progress.
trans-unit.target: 多點傳送的群組已經加入或聯結作業正在進行中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"> </xref>已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 當您嘗試存取通訊端時，就會發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section for more information.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 < 備註 > 一節，如需詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: Begins the operation of receiving a packet from the joined multicast group and invokes the specified callback when a packet has arrived on the group from a specified sender.
trans-unit.target: 開始從已加入多點傳送群組接收封包的作業，並將封包已從指定的寄件者送達群組時，會叫用指定的回呼。

trans-unit.source: The BeginReceiveFromSource method begins an operation of receiving a UDP packet from the joined multicast group from a single sender.
trans-unit.target: BeginReceiveFromSource 方法開始從單一傳送者的聯結多點傳送群組接收 UDP 封包的作業。

trans-unit.source: The local port, multicast group, and sender source address are specified in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 中指定本機連接埠、 多點傳送的群組和寄件者來源位址<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The multicast client must also have completed a join to the multicast group.
trans-unit.target: 多點傳送的用戶端必須也完成聯結多點傳送群組。

trans-unit.source: The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when a packet has received.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的方法`callback`收到封包時，會叫用參數。

trans-unit.source: It is possible to have a socket failure if a receive operation fails synchronously, although this is uncommon with UDP.
trans-unit.target: 很可能發生通訊端失敗的狀況，如果接收作業失敗，以同步方式，雖然這是不常見 udp。

trans-unit.source: If a socket failure occurs, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生通訊端失敗，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>就會擲回。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: The error received is specified as a member of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 收到的錯誤指定成員的身分<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>列舉型別。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>

trans-unit.source: The buffer to store the received data.
trans-unit.target: 要儲存已接收的資料緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The offset, in bytes, from the beginning of the `buffer` where the data should be stored.
trans-unit.target: 以位元組為單位，從開頭的位移，`buffer`儲存資料的位置。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to receive and store in the `buffer`.
trans-unit.target: 接收並儲存在位元組的數目上限`buffer`。

trans-unit.source: The callback method to invoke when the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 要在作業完成時叫用的回呼方法。

trans-unit.source: Optional state information to pass to the `callback` method for this operation.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞給選擇性狀態資訊`callback`這項作業的方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.IAsyncResult>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.IAsyncResult>.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references this operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>參考這項作業。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: buffer is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: buffer為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中 Nothing)。

trans-unit.source: offset is less than 0 -or- offset is greater than the length of the buffer.
trans-unit.target: offset小於 0-offset大於的長度buffer。

trans-unit.source: -or- count is less than 0 -or- offset plus the count is greater than the length of the buffer.
trans-unit.target: -count小於 0-offset加上計數大於的長度buffer。

trans-unit.source: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
trans-unit.target: 尚未聯結多點傳送的群組。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"> </xref>已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket for receiving.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取接收通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section for more information.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 < 備註 > 一節，如需詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: Begins the operation of sending a unicast packet to the source previously specified.
trans-unit.target: 開始將單點傳播封包傳送至先前指定的來源的作業。

trans-unit.source: The BeginSendToSource method begins an operation of sending a UDP packet to the source previously specified.
trans-unit.target: BeginSendToSource 方法開始作業，將 UDP 封包傳送至先前指定的來源。

trans-unit.source: Some protocols use this information to pass along flow control, quality of service statistics, or recovery messages.
trans-unit.target: 某些通訊協定會使用此資訊來流量控制，品質的服務統計資料或復原訊息一起傳遞。

trans-unit.source: The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when a packet has been sent.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的方法`callback`已傳送封包時，會叫用參數。

trans-unit.source: The client must have completed a join to the multicast group.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端必須已經完成聯結多點傳送群組。

trans-unit.source: If the destination port specified in the `remotePort` parameter is less than 1,024, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown with <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>.
trans-unit.target: 如果在指定目的地連接埠`remotePort`參數是不超過 1024，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: It is possible to have a socket failure if a send operation fails synchronously, although this is uncommon with UDP.
trans-unit.target: 很可能發生通訊端失敗的狀況，如果傳送作業失敗，以同步方式，雖然這是不常見 udp。

trans-unit.source: If a socket failure occurs, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生通訊端失敗，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>就會擲回。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: The error received is specified as a member of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 收到的錯誤指定成員的身分<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>列舉型別。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>

trans-unit.source: The buffer that contains the data to send.
trans-unit.target: 包含要傳送之資料的緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The offset, in bytes, from the beginning of the `buffer` to read the data to be sent.
trans-unit.target: 以位元組為單位，從開頭的位移，`buffer`讀取要傳送的資料。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to send from the `buffer`.
trans-unit.target: 若要從傳送的位元組數目`buffer`。

trans-unit.source: The remote port to which the packet is to be sent.
trans-unit.target: 遠端連接埠是傳送封包。

trans-unit.source: The remote address is specified by the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的遠端位址<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The callback method to invoke when the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 要在作業完成時叫用的回呼方法。

trans-unit.source: Optional state information to pass to the `callback` method for this operation.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞給選擇性狀態資訊`callback`這項作業的方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.IAsyncResult>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.IAsyncResult>.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references this operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>參考這項作業。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: buffer is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: buffer為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中 Nothing)。

trans-unit.source: offset is less than 0 -or- offset is greater than the length of the buffer.
trans-unit.target: offset小於 0-offset大於的長度buffer。

trans-unit.source: -or- count is less than 0 -or- offset plus the count is greater than the length of the buffer.
trans-unit.target: -count小於 0-offset加上計數大於的長度buffer。

trans-unit.source: -or- remotePort is less than 0 or greater than 65,535.
trans-unit.target: -或-remotePort小於 0 或大於 65,535。

trans-unit.source: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
trans-unit.target: 尚未聯結多點傳送的群組。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"> </xref>已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 當您嘗試存取通訊端時，就會發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section for more information.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 < 備註 > 一節，如需詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: Leaves the multicast group and releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"></xref> class and the underlying the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: 離開多點傳送的群組，而且目前的執行個體所使用的資源全部釋出<xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"></xref>類別和基礎<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>呼叫 Dispose

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 方法會使<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>中無法使用的狀態。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 Dispose 之後，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>所佔用。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>

trans-unit.source: Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>.
trans-unit.target: 在發行您的最後一個參考至<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>前，務必呼叫 Dispose

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient> object's <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它所使用的資源將不會釋放直到記憶體回收行程呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>物件的<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>

trans-unit.source: Completes the asynchronous join group operation to a multicast group.
trans-unit.target: 完成非同步加入群組作業，以便多點傳送群組。

trans-unit.source: The EndJoinGroup method completes an asynchronous bind to a socket and join operation to a multicast group.
trans-unit.target: EndJoinGroup 方法完成的非同步通訊端與聯結多點傳送群組作業繫結。

trans-unit.source: If required by the runtime, the EndJoinGroup method also performs a policy check to verify that the client is allowed to access the multicast group.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要執行階段，EndJoinGroup 方法也會執行原則檢查，確認允許用戶端存取多點傳送的群組。

trans-unit.source: If the client is not allowed access, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown with <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允許存取，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>就會擲回與<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError></xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>用戶端。

trans-unit.source: If there is a socket failure while performing the join group operation, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行 加入群組作業中，通訊端失敗<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>就會擲回。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: The error received is specified as a member of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 收到的錯誤指定成員的身分<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>列舉型別。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>

trans-unit.source: The result of the asynchronous join operation.
trans-unit.target: 非同步加入作業的結果。

trans-unit.source: result is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: result為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中 Nothing)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"> </xref>已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 當您嘗試存取通訊端時，就會發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section for more information.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 < 備註 > 一節，如需詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: Completes the asynchronous operation of receiving a packet from the joined multicast group and provides the information received.
trans-unit.target: 完成從聯結多點傳送群組接收封包的非同步作業，並提供接收到的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The EndReceiveFromSource method completes an asynchronous operation to receive a packet from a single source in a multicast group.
trans-unit.target: EndReceiveFromSource 方法完成非同步作業以多點傳送群組中的單一來源接收的封包。

trans-unit.source: If there is a socket failure while performing the receive operation, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果同時執行接收作業中，通訊端失敗<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>就會擲回。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: The error received is specified as a member of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 收到的錯誤指定成員的身分<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>列舉型別。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>

trans-unit.source: The result of the asynchronous receive operation.
trans-unit.target: 結果的非同步接收作業。

trans-unit.source: The source endpoint where the packet was received from.
trans-unit.target: 封包在收到來自來源端點。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The length, in bytes, of the message stored in the buffer parameter passed to the method.
trans-unit.target: 中所儲存之訊息的長度，以位元組為單位， buffer 參數傳遞至方法。

trans-unit.source: result is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: result為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中 Nothing)。

trans-unit.source: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
trans-unit.target: 尚未聯結多點傳送的群組。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"> </xref>已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 當您嘗試存取通訊端時，就會發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section for more information.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 < 備註 > 一節，如需詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: Completes the operation of sending a unicast packet to a single source.
trans-unit.target: 完成傳送單點傳播封包至單一來源的作業。

trans-unit.source: The EndSendToSource method completes an asynchronous operation to send a packet to single source previously specified.
trans-unit.target: EndSendToSource 方法完成非同步作業以將封包傳送到先前指定的單一來源。

trans-unit.source: If there is a socket failure while performing the receive operation, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果同時執行接收作業中，通訊端失敗<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>就會擲回。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: The error received is specified as a member of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 收到的錯誤指定成員的身分<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>列舉型別。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>

trans-unit.source: The result of the asynchronous send operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示非同步傳送作業的結果。

trans-unit.source: result is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: result為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中 Nothing)。

trans-unit.source: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
trans-unit.target: 尚未聯結多點傳送的群組。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"> </xref>已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 當您嘗試存取通訊端時，就會發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section for more information.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 < 備註 > 一節，如需詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the receive buffer of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> used for multicast receive operations on this <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定大小，以位元組為單位的接收緩衝區<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>上多點傳送的接收作業所使用的<xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"></xref>執行個體。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: The `ReceiveBufferSize` property gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the receive buffer of the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> used for multicast receive operations on this <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient> instance.
trans-unit.target: `ReceiveBufferSize`屬性會取得或設定大小，以位元組為單位的接收緩衝區的基礎<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>上多點傳送的接收作業所使用的<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>執行個體。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the `ReceiveBufferSize` property controls the size of the buffer used by the stack when a packet arrives, but the application has not yet called the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromSource%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 具體來說，`ReceiveBufferSize`屬性會控制與堆疊使用的封包到達，但應用程式尚未呼叫時之緩衝區的大小<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromSource%2A>方法。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this buffer gets filled up and packets keep coming before the application calls the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromSource%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.EndReceiveFromSource%2A> methods, old packets will get dropped.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個緩衝區填滿，而且封包保留應用程式會呼叫之前進入<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromSource%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.EndReceiveFromSource%2A>會卸除舊的封包的方法。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.EndReceiveFromSource%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The application will never be able to receive the old packets, and will instead receive newer packets when it calls the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromSource%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式將無法接收舊的封包，並呼叫時，會收到較新的封包<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromSource%2A>方法。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default size of the receive buffer on Windows is 8,192.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows 上接收緩衝區的預設大小為 8,192。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The size, in bytes, of the receive buffer.
trans-unit.target: 以位元組為單位，接收緩衝區的大小。

trans-unit.source: The buffer size specified is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 指定的緩衝區大小小於 0。

trans-unit.source: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
trans-unit.target: 尚未聯結多點傳送的群組。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"> </xref>已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the send buffer of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> used for multicast send operations on this <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定大小，以位元組為單位的傳送緩衝區<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>上多點傳送的傳送作業所使用的<xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"></xref>執行個體。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: The SendBufferSize property gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the send buffer of the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> used for multicast send operations on this <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient> instance.
trans-unit.target: SendBufferSize 屬性取得或設定大小，以位元組為單位的傳送緩衝區基礎<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>上多點傳送的傳送作業所使用的<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>執行個體。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: On Mac OS X, the SendBufferSize property controls how many bytes can be in the network stack's waiting-to-be-sent buffer before additional calls to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginSendToSource%2A> method start failing.
trans-unit.target: 在 Mac OS X 上，SendBufferSize 屬性會控制多少位元組有可能在網路堆疊傳送等候緩衝區額外的呼叫之前<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginSendToSource%2A>方法開始失敗。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginSendToSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Applications on Mac OS X may need to be concerned with this property if they are sending a large number of UDP packets in a short timeframe.
trans-unit.target: Mac OS X 上的應用程式可能需要顧慮這個屬性如果他們傳送大量的 UDP 封包在短時間範圍內。

trans-unit.source: On Windows, calls to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginSendToSource%2A> method will take longer to call the callback depending on the value of the SendBufferSize property if the send buffer is full.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows 中，呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginSendToSource%2A>方法會將較長的時間呼叫的回呼 SendBufferSize 屬性的值而定，如果傳送緩衝區已滿。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginSendToSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SendBufferSize property only controls whether the user's buffer stays locked in physical memory until the send completes.
trans-unit.target: SendBufferSize 屬性只會控制 「 傳送作業完成之前是否使用者的緩衝區會保持鎖定實體記憶體中。

trans-unit.source: The default size of the send buffer on Windows is 8,192.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows 上的傳送緩衝區的預設大小為 8,192。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The size, in bytes, of the send buffer.
trans-unit.target: 以位元組為單位傳送緩衝區大小。

trans-unit.source: The buffer size specified is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 指定的緩衝區大小小於 0。

trans-unit.source: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
trans-unit.target: 尚未聯結多點傳送的群組。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient"> </xref>已經過處置。
